at.ac.oeaw.cemm.bsf.vcffilter.genomeutils

Class Sort

  • java.lang.Object
    • at.ac.oeaw.cemm.bsf.vcffilter.genomeutils.Sort
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    GenomicElementSort

    public class Sort
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Implements a number of sort algorithms. Sort.java 04 OCT 2016
    Since:
    1.0
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Sort()
      Creates a new instance of Sort Implementation of shell sort for various types of arrays

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      char[] shellsort(char[] data)
      shell sort for 1D char array
      double[] shellsort(double[] data)
      shell sort for 1D double array
      double[][] shellsort(double[][] data, int column)
      shell sort for 2D double array first index = row index second index = column index user can choose what column to sort on via the column parameter
      int[] shellsort(int[] data)
      shell sort for 1D int array
      int[][] shellsort(int[][] data, int column)
      shell sort for 2D int array first index = row index second index = column index user can choose what column to sort on via the column parameter
      java.lang.String[] shellsort(java.lang.String[] data)
      shell sort for 1D String array
      java.lang.String[][] shellsort(java.lang.String[][] data, int column)
      shell sort for 2D String array of Integers sorting is done by numerical order first index = row index second index = column index user can choose what column to sort on via the column parameter
      int[] shellsortdescending(int[] data)
      shell sort for 1D int array
      int[][] shellsortdescending(int[][] data, int column)
      shell sort for 2D int array first index = row index second index = column index user can choose what column to sort on via the column parameter
      java.lang.String[][] shellsortText(java.lang.String[][] data, int column)
      shell sort for 2D String array sorting is done as text first index = row index second index = column index user can choose what column to sort on via the column parameter

    • Method Detail

      • shellsort

        public java.lang.String[][] shellsort(java.lang.String[][] data,
                                      int column)
        shell sort for 2D String array of Integers sorting is done by numerical order first index = row index second index = column index user can choose what column to sort on via the column parameter
        Parameters:
        data - a 2D String array
        column - the column index where to sort on
        Returns:
        sorted 2D String array

      • shellsortText

        public java.lang.String[][] shellsortText(java.lang.String[][] data,
                                          int column)
        shell sort for 2D String array sorting is done as text first index = row index second index = column index user can choose what column to sort on via the column parameter
        Parameters:
        data - a 2D String array
        column - the column index where to sort on
        Returns:
        sorted 2D String array
